text: George Bastl and Chris Guccione were the reigning champions; however, Bastl retired in 2009 and Guccione chose to participate in Baton Rouge instead. Nicolas Mahut and Lovro Zovko won in the final 6–2, 6–2 against Raven Klaasen and Izak van der Merwe. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== * Doubles Draw Soweto Open - Doubles 2010 Men's Doubles
title: 2010 Soweto Open – Doubles
